layerItems.description:
OpenEmbedded-Core is a layer containing the core metadata for current versions
of OpenEmbedded. It is distro-less (can build a functional image with
DISTRO = "nodistro") and contains only emulated machine support.
layerItems.name: openembedded-core

layerItems.description: Multimedia related components such as gstreamer, alsa, dvb, etc.
layerItems.name: meta-multimedia

recipes.description: GUPnP-AV is a collection of helpers for building AV (audio/video) applications using GUPnP.

recipes.description: GUPnP is an elegant, object-oriented open source framework for creating UPnP  devices and control points, written in C using GObject and libsoup. The GUPnP API is intended to be easy to use, efficient and flexible. It provides the same set of features as libupnp, but shields the developer from most of UPnP's internals.
recipes.inherits: autotools gobject-introspection gobject-introspection-data pkgconfig python3-dir python3native siteconfig siteinfo vala
autotools gobject-introspection gobject-introspection-data pkgconfig python3-dir python3native siteconfig siteinfo vala
recipes.summary: Helpers for AV applications using DLNA

recipes.description: The Portable SDK for UPnP Devices is an SDK for development of UPnP device and control point applications. It consists of the core UPnP protocols along with a UPnP-specific eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser supporting the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 API and an optional, integrated mini web server for serving UPnP related documents.

Rygel is a home media solution (UPnP AV MediaServer) that allow you to easily share audio, video and pictures to other devices. Additionally, media player software may use Rygel to become a MediaRenderer that may be controlled remotely by a UPnP or DLNA Controller.
recipes.inherits: autotools gnomebase gobject-introspection gobject-introspection-data pkgconfig python3-dir python3native siteconfig siteinfo vala
recipes.summary: A UPnP AV media server and renderer

SoX is the Swiss Army knife of sound processing tools. It converts audio files among various standard audio file formats and can apply different effects and filters to the audio data.

recipes.description: dleyna-core is a library of utility functions that are used by the higher level dLeyna libraries that communicate with DLNA devices, e.g., dleyna-server. In brief, it provides APIs for logging, error, settings and task management and an IPC asbstraction API.
dleyna-renderer is a library for implementing services that allow clients to discover and manipulate Digital Media Renderers. An implementation of such a service for linux is also included.
dleyna-server is a library for implementing services that allow clients to discover, browse and manipulate Digital Media Servers. An implementation of such a service for linux is also included.

recipes.description: GstOpenMAX is a GStreamer plug-in that allows communication with OpenMAX Integration Layer (IL) components. OpenMAX IL is an industry standard that provides an abstraction layer for computer graphics, video, and sound routines.
